caption.p: Photomicrographs of muscle tissues of (a) control, (b) diabetic, (c) diabetic + metformin, (d) diabetic + the methanolic-extract-treated mice. Note the presence of mononucleated inflammatory cells (up-pointing bullet) and muscles replaced by the adipose tissue with (down-pointing arrow) with nonhomogenous fiber size distribution against homogeneous fiber size distribution in control mice and metformin- as well as the methanolic extract of C. auriculata- treated diabetic mice muscle section.
